sn14.13:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava natike viharati ginjakavasathe.
sn14.13:2.1: “Dhatum, bhikkhave, paticca uppajjati sanna, uppajjati ditthi, uppajjati vitakko”ti.
sn14.13:2.2: Evam vutte, ayasma kaccano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn14.13:2.4: ‘asammasambuddhesu sammasambuddha’ti, ayam nu kho, bhante, ditthi kim paticca pannayati”ti?
sn14.13:3.1: “Mahati kho esa, kaccana, dhatu yadidam avijjadhatu.
sn14.13:3.2: Hinam, kaccana, dhatum paticca uppajjati hina sanna, hina ditthi, hino vitakko, hina cetana, hina patthana, hino panidhi, hino puggalo, hina vaca;
sn14.13:3.3: hinam acikkhati deseti pannapeti patthapeti vivarati vibhajati uttanikaroti;
sn14.13:4.1: Majjhimam, kaccana, dhatum paticca uppajjati majjhima sanna, majjhima ditthi, majjhimo vitakko, majjhima cetana, majjhima patthana, majjhimo panidhi, majjhimo puggalo, majjhima vaca;
sn14.13:4.2: majjhimam acikkhati deseti pannapeti patthapeti vivarati vibhajati uttanikaroti;
sn14.13:5.1: Panitam, kaccana, dhatum paticca uppajjati panita sanna, panita ditthi, panito vitakko, panita cetana, panita patthana, panito panidhi, panito puggalo, panita vaca;
sn14.13:5.2: panitam acikkhati deseti pannapeti patthapeti vivarati vibhajati uttanikaroti;
